welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pandi, Philippines! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in the city.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Baler Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest international terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for multiple airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 2-hour time limit per user.
